about_the_game:
Introducing Walstikski, the epitome of thrilling challenge in the gaming world! Embark on a journey through a myriad of ingeniously crafted levels, each more daunting than the last, all in pursuit of the ultimate prize: the coveted donut.

Prepare to test your skills and determination against a barrage of obstacles, from mind-bending droppers to intricately designed parkour courses that will push you to your limits and beyond. Every level is meticulously designed to offer an exhilarating blend of fun and frustration, ensuring an experience like no other.

But wait, the adventure doesn't end there! With upcoming updates, Walstikski promises even more excitement with the addition of multiplayer functionality, allowing you to challenge friends and foes alike in the ultimate test of skill and agility. And for those craving a deeper immersion, a captivating story mode will soon be unveiled, immersing you in a narrative-rich world filled with mystery and intrigue.

So, do you dare to take on the challenge? Can you conquer the seemingly insurmountable obstacles that stand between you and victory? With Walstikski, the question isn't whether you can beat the game—it's whether you have what it takes to rise to the challenge and emerge victorious. Prepare yourself, for the ultimate test awaits!

name: Walstikski

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.5GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM Intel HD 4000 / GeForce 200 Series / Radeon HD 4000 Series
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4670 / AMD A10-7850K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX960 VRAM 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 380 VRAM 2GB and over
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews:
“Best bad game to every exist”
10/10 – LilTaq
short_description: Welcome to Walstikski, where a solo parkour adventure awaits! Navigate through a whimsical world filled with quirky challenges in each level. Test your skill and determination to conquer them all. Are you up for the challenge of emerging victorious?
